title: Mapo Tofu
lyrics:
You feel like the one when I taste it
Oh, girl you got me gone I can’t shake it
You must be a shot ‘cause I’m faded
All on my mind and my tongue oh yeah
Lips are so numb, hands on my body

I don’t know what you got but I’m outta control baby

Juice in my veins I can’t stop staring at you

You got me going inside, you got me feeling all right



All in my brain girl, make you my main girl

We could leave and be alone from this crazy world

I got time for ya, I’m gon’ ride for ya, I want you by my side ya’

I’m in a trance and you blowing my mind, spicy and you are so fine



Like Mapo tofu (hey oh)

Girl Mapo tofu (oh)

Like Mapo tofu (I love it oh)

Girl like Mapo tofu, hot like Mapo tofu (oh)



Girl I can’t shake this feelin’ ya’

My head is through the ceiling

My heart is beating like a thunder storm

Dancing ‘cause your body’s like a party

I can’t believe it



All in my brain girl, make you my main girl

We could leave and be alone from this crazy world

I got time for ya’, I’m gon’ ride for ya’, I want you by my side ya’

I’m in a trance and you blowing my mind, spicy and you are so fine



Like Mapo tofu (hey oh)

Girl Mapo tofu (oh)

Like Mapo tofu (I love it oh oh oh)

Girl like Mapo tofu, hot like Mapo tofu (oh)



You can take my keys and drive I don’t mind, you can call anytime

Hit my line I don’t mind, just as long as you’re mine (I don’t mind)

Girl I swear that you’re the one I been waiting for

I’m lookin’ for the one and girl you make it easy



Like Mapo tofu (hey oh)

Girl Mapo tofu (hey oh)

Like Mapo tofu (I love it oh)

Girl like Mapo tofu, hot like Mapo tofu
